content.rendered:
Reshma Nair is an HR Generalist bringing over 20 years of diverse experience in all facets of HR and payroll. Her subject matter expertise includes all the facets of the entire lifecycle of an employee.

She holds a Bachelor’s degree in Commerce and a CIPD Level 5. She has worked in numerous capacities with diverse range of HR responsibilities for a variety of companies including the education, IT, finance, retail industry just to name a few.

Reshma is currently the HR Officer with Regent Group. As rightly said by Steve Wynn, “Human Resources isn’t a thing we do. It’s the thing that runs our business.”
